_header: He is well sicker that hath cleanness

BLHar7322.Transcription: He is wel sicker þat hat clennessefor al þat oþer reuenant is not bot wrechedenesse
BLHar7322.Note: Written as prose inserted into Latin.
BLHar7322.Editions:
Furnivall,  Frederick James,
                        ed.  
             Political, Religious and Love Poems, from Lambeth MS. 306 and other
                sources.
